about_the_game:
Is it to save the master or to save the living?

The God-forging War has just ended, and there is a new shock in the three worlds...

The world's supreme deity, Yuan Shi Tian Zun, who is in charge of the world order, has suddenly changed his temperament. As a disciple of Yuan Shi Tian Zun and in charge of the God Sealing List and the God Beating Whip, Jiang Zi Ya finds something wrong and is ready to confront Yuan Shi Tian Zun on Mount Kunlun. However, the crisis of the three worlds gradually approaching, he had to gather his friends, together against this not quite right Yuan Shi Tianzun.

With the help of many immortals, Yuan Shi Tian Zun, who fought against the immortals by himself, was lost, while Jiang Ziya lived a reclusive life with a baby in his arms in the middle of the war. The great war produced a large amount of aura due to the uncontrollable and leaked to the three worlds, the three worlds began a new turmoil, humans have more possibilities to become immortal, and evil demons have come out, disturbing the order of the three worlds, this world is the world of Yuanxu.

Sixteen years later, the three worlds had stabilized, and even though there were great demons in charge everywhere, and people were living in the midst of fire and water, many cultivators were born to punish evil and promote good, to maintain this weak balance as much as possible. However, one day, the breath of Yuan Shi Tian Zun reappeared in the world of Yuan Xu, has been living in seclusion, Jiang Zi Ya disappeared one night, leaving only you who was raised by him and a letter, in the dark you feel that this is also a little related to yourself, carrying this letter, you decided to embark on the journey of immortality, to find their master Jiang Zi Ya.

Main game features

  • Super random events and access to props, test your luck and test your guts at the same time.
  • Hundreds of Fabao, Dan and talismans have their own characteristics and are very unique.
  • Hundreds of random events to test your luck and guts at all times.
  • Hundreds of feats with various styles of play, and various effects that never repeat.
  • Hundreds of secret events in which you can gain a lot.
  • Whether you become a virtuous immortal or a wicked demon is up to you.
  • Fast-paced game, get rid of the boring and repetitive brush brush brush.
  • Help others and you will get a chance to exchange for the equipment you need.
  • Help others and get the chance to get the equipment you need.
    • Attend the Immortal Gate Conference to defend Jiang Tai Gong's reputation; attend the Alchemy Conference to become the master alchemist in the three worlds;
    • There are many sets and many ways to play, and once you start, there is no way to stop.
    • Challenge yourself as well as others, and compete together in the rankings for strength and weakness.
    • The game is casual and easy to play, no liver and no mandatory tasks, you can play as you like.

    If you encounter game problems or do not understand the place, you can join our QQ group: 810530980

highlighted.name: The Time For Solidify Core Phase
The Road of Nascent Soul Phase

name: Legend of Tai gong

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports up to 2560x1440

short_description: You will embark on the journey of immortality as a disciple brought back and raised by Jiang Ziya. While searching and saving Jiang Ziya, you will uncover the secrets surrounding yourself and write a different legend.
